wikitext.*:
<noinclude>{{month|March}}
Events that occurred on 1 March.
==On Earth==
</noinclude>
* '''[[1939]]''' - Actor [[David Weatherley]] is born.
* '''[[1939]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 36a]].
* '''[[1944]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 56]].
* '''[[1948]]''' - Actor [[Steven M. Kramer]] is born.
* '''[[1957]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 195b]].
* '''[[1960]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 222d]].
* '''[[1967]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Hans-Jörg Modlmayr (1 March 1967)|a letter to Hans-Jörg Modlmayr]].
* '''[[1968]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Miss E. Byrne (1 March 1968)|a letter to Miss E. Byrne]].
* '''[[2001]]''' - ''[[Tyalië Tyelelliéva]]'' issue [[Tyalië Tyelelliéva 16|16]] is published.
* '''[[2007]]''' - ''[[The Company They Keep]]'' is published.
* '''[[2007]]''' - [[Electronic Arts]] releases ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth Anthology|The Battle for Middle-earth Anthology]]''.
* '''[[2010]]''' - ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: Pocket Guide]]'' is published.
* '''[[2010]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]: [[The Lord of the Rings Online: Siege of Mirkwood#Volume III: Allies of the King|Volume III: Allies of the King]]'', "Oath of the Rangers" is released.
* '''[[2010]]''' - ''Oliphaunt Limited Edition Poster'' is published. 
* '''[[2013]]''' - [[Vinyar Tengwar 50|''Vinyar Tengwar'' 50]] is published.

==In Arda==
* {{TA|2931}}:
** [[Aragorn]], son of [[Arathorn II|Arathorn]], [[Heir of Isildur]], is born. 
* {{TA|3019}}:
** [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]], [[Samwise Gamgee|Sam]] and [[Gollum]] begin the passage of the [[Dead Marshes]] at dawn. They temporarily halt and hide from a flying [[Nazgûl]].
** The [[Entmoot]], which started on [[30 February]], continues. 
** Aragorn enters Fangorn and meets [[Gandalf|Gandalf the White]]. They set out for [[Edoras]]. 
** [[Faramir]] and his men leave for [[Ithilien]] to ambush the [[Southrons]] marching to [[Mordor]].
* {{FoA|120}}:
** Death of King [[Aragorn|Elessar]] of the Reunited Kingdom of [[Gondor]] and [[Arnor]]. [[Eldarion]], son of Elessar and [[Arwen]], becomes King.
* {{FoA|121}}:
** Death of [[Arwen Undómiel]], the Queen of the Reunited Kingdom, at [[Cerin Amroth]].

<noinclude>[[Category:Dates|061]][[de:1. März]]</noinclude>
